author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposed to add the possibility to:
1. run `das-up-to-nevents.py` without using the Golden DMQ certification json (with `--nogolden`);
2. parse a list of runs to be used (with `-r RUN1,RUN2,RUN3,...`.

#### PR validation:

Tested with (e.g.)

`das-up-to-nevents.py -d /JetMET1/Run2024I-TeVJet-PromptReco-v1/RAW-RECO -e 10000 -pc -l lumi_ranges.txt -r 386593 --nogolden`

Outputs

```
/store/data/Run2024I/JetMET1/RAW-RECO/TeVJet-PromptReco-v1/000/386/593/00000/f8e21b31-0072-4cf3-b2da-ce23219fbfb2.root
/store/data/Run2024I/JetMET1/RAW-RECO/TeVJet-PromptReco-v1/000/386/593/00000/35970638-c6d9-4c51-8f96-8297a1c0df72.root
/store/data/Run2024I/JetMET1/RAW-RECO/TeVJet-PromptReco-v1/000/386/593/00000/76ef6554-9d1d-4c77-82d2-a96a92d5c0e7.root
/store/data/Run2024I/JetMET1/RAW-RECO/TeVJet-PromptReco-v1/000/386/593/00000/d8c242dd-d788-46b6-a3eb-e4f937c83176.root
/store/data/Run2024I/JetMET1/RAW-RECO/TeVJet-PromptReco-v1/000/386/593/00000/5159fe0e-c790-492a-a3e5-4e05bb1dad00.root
```
title: Allowing No Golden and Run Based Skim Option of `das-up-to-nevents.py`
